REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f4349 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-DEF 03-17 0091

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET DEFICIT FORECAST AT 450 MLN STG
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it forecast a shortage of around 450 mln stg in the money market today. Among the main factors affecting liquidity, bills maturing in official hands and the take-up of treasury bills will drain some 650 mln stg while banker's balances below target will take out around 50 mln stg. Partly offsetting these outflows, exchequer transactions and a fall in note circulation will add some 200 mln stg and 50 mln stg to the system respectively. REUTER
